1.content:

Chad's mom replies "Yes, but we'll go out to dinner tonight after you get home from school. Are you going like that or at least put some flops on your bare feet?"
Chad replies "Come on mom, it's my birthday. You know I love to go barefoot everywhere."
Chad'l mom says back to him "But it's snowing outside. Do what you want, but at least put some flops on, so your bare soles won't freeze!"
Chad looks outside and says "O--kay...but I'm taking them off at school."

As Chad trots up, they both say "Happy Birthday dude!" They both look down at his bare feet. Chad wiggles his toes.
Jackson says "Aren't your feet cold Chad?" George pipes in saying "Yeah, it's freezing outside...why aren't you wearing shoes?"
Chad replies "Come on guys, you know I like to go barefoot all the time. My mom made me wear flops to school, but I took them off when I got inside. My toes get cramped in shoes and I get blisters easy, so I decided to go barefoot everywhere."
Just then the bell rings and everyone races to their classrooms. Chad runs barefoot to his class down the hall.
A moment later, Chad enters and sits in the front row of desks in the middle. His fellow classmates file in and some notice Chad's bare feet sticking out in front of his desk.
The teacher walks in and puts his belongings down on his desk. The teacher says "Good morning class." The class responds "Good Morning Mr. Hopkins." Mr. Hopkins smiles and looks around the class and then spots Chad's bare feet in the front row.
Mr. Hopkins says "Uh Chad, are we playing Huckleberry Finn today?" Chad looks at him funny, then looks down at his bare feet. As Chad splays his pedicured, slender toes, he replies "Mr. Hopkins, today is my birthday and I wanted to go barefoot today, in fact, everyday. Wearing shoes gives me blisters and wearing socks make my feet sweat." Mr. Hopkins looks closer at Chad's bare feet and toes then says "Well, you do have nice looking bare feet Chad, but it's in the middle of winter outside. I'll let you go barefoot today since it's your birthday, but after today, it's shoes until spring...okay?" Chad nods his head and wiggles his toes. A girl smiles at Chad making him blush.
Later during PE, Jackson and Chad are playing basketball. Both boys are in the PE uniform, but Chad is barefoot. He says to Jackson "Uh do you mind taking your shoes off so you won't step on my bare feet?" Jackson looks down at Chad's bare feet and replies "Sure, why not, maybe I can shoot better without shoes on anyways." Jackson kicks off his shoes and tosses them against the wall. He is wearing some calk high dark socks on his feet. Jackson continues "Ahh, much better. My toes love to be free of shoes too."
Chad replies "Your feet would feel better bare. Go ahead Jackson lose the socks too!" Chad smiles as Jackson quickly peels off his dark socks and throws them by his shoes. He splays his lightly tan, pedicured, long slender toes on his smooth, hairless bare feet.
Chad says "Now isn't that better?" Jackson looks down at his bare beauties and replies "My gosh Chad, your right. I love walking barefoot especially on this wooden gym floor."
Both boys continue their game of basketball in their bare feet. Their classmates see them both barefoot and decide to shed their shoes and socks and play basketball in their bare feet. Soon, the whole gym floor is covered by hundreds of bare feet of different shapes, colors and sizes.
